Name: 360 Yes Scope
Description: Spinning 360 degrees provides a 3-second buff that gives the next shot a 1.5x damage multiplier. The buff stacks if the player spins multiple times.

Name: Absent Minded
Description: The Membrane's shots bounce 4 times and become homing.

Name: Added Effect - Fire
Description: The first shot of each magazine is guaranteed to be a fire bullet.

Name: Added Effect - Ice
Description: The first shot of each magazine is guaranteed to be an ice bullet.

Name: Added Effect - Poison
Description: The first shot of each magazine is guaranteed to be a poison bullet.

Name: Akey Breaky
Description: AKEY-47 receives a damage boost (10 damage per bullet), infinite ammo, and changes in appearance to resemble a Shelleton and can no longer open locks by shooting at them.

Name: AI Assistant
Description: Roll bombs will bounce around instead of detonating immediately, and can be manually detonated with iBomb Companion App.

Name: Air Support
Description: Air Strike covers a massive area.

Name: AK-47 (Island Forme)
Description: Pressing reload with a full magazine toggles Island Forme. Island Forme AK-47 fires oranges, which deal more damage than regular AK-47 shots. Each orange does 7 damage per shot, as opposed to the usual 5.5.

Name: Alas, Sniperion
Description: Crown of Guns transforms into a tiara that fires higher-damage crescent-shaped bullets.

Name: Alistair's Ladder
Description: Thunderclap shoots 2 bullets instead of one.

Name: All Out Of Law
Description: Colt 1851 fires three tight spreads of three free bullets upon reloading. These projectiles ignore tables when fired from behind them.

Name: Alternative Rock
Description: Face Melter fires two parallel columns of notes, shoots a guitar pick with a chance to stun upon reloading, and changes appearance to that of a Dean Z Blue Burst guitar.

Name: Ancient Aliens
Description: Gives Zorgun 3 Final Shots, and gives Alien Engine occasional Zorgun bullets.

Name: Anti-Aircraft
Description: RPG spawns 7 homing flak bullets upon impact.

Name: Antichamber
Description: Dark Marker alternates between firing red and blue shots that become very slow and large after traveling a short distance. If any red and blue shots touch, the blank effect is activated.

Name: Apiary
Description: Bee Hive turns into an apiary and automatically regenerates ammo over time.

Name: Assault and Battery
Description: The guns are dual-wielded.

Name: Arctic Warfare
Description: A.W.P.'s color changes to orange and white, its shots freeze enemies, and it deals 62.5% more damage.

Name: Armored Corps
Description: Both guns gain increased shot speed and deal 25% more damage.

Name: Backdraft
Description: Touching enemies sets them on fire.

Name: Bacon and Eggs
Description: Increases the speed of The Scrambler's eggs by 50%.

Name: Banshee Cry
Description: Screecher fires a cone of three waves per shot.

Name: Barrage Shot
Description: Decreases the charge time of Charge Shot by 25%, increases reload time by 50%, and increases shot size.

Name: Battery Powered
Description: Shock Rifle slowly regenerates ammo over time.

Name: Battle Mode
Description: Bombs periodically spawn and orbit the player, exploding and dealing 40 damage upon touching an enemy.

Name: Bee Plus
Description: Taking damage causes Honeycomb to spawn hornets, which travel faster and deal more damage than regular bees.

Name: BEES
Description: Doubles the size of Bee Hive's bees and increases their damage by 25%, but decreases Bee Hive's rate of fire by 34%.

Name: Behold!
Description:
Increases damage by 30%, magazine size by 50%, spread by 50%, decreases reload time by 33%, and slows down enemy bullets by 20% when one of the guns is held.

When Eye of the Beholster is held, the other five guns rotate around the player and shoot at nearby enemies, still using up ammo from each gun.

Obtainable through the Beholster Shrine, although it can be activated without.

Name: Beta Ray
Description: Gamma Ray's beam grows larger and deals more damage.

Name: Betrayer's Lies
Description: Betrayer's Shield gains infinite ammo, a much larger magazine size, and extremely high fire rate. Like other guns with infinite ammo, it cannot reveal secret rooms.

Name: Big Shotgun Gun
Description: Big Shotgun fires 4 projectiles instead of 3. The player also has an extended roll while holding the Big Shotgun.

Name: Birthright
Description: While Shellegun is held, Baby Good Shelleton alternates between its laser and a wide-angle shot similar to the Shelleton enemy.

Name: Black Flag
Description: Corsair gains a black flag, and every Corsair shot will periodically fire two bouncing cannonballs perpendicular to itself as it travels.

Name: blade
Description: Kruller Glaive's damage is increased by 20%, enemies hit will visually bleed, and jammed enemies will revert to normal on hit.

Name: Blade Runner
Description: Increases the magazine size of both weapons by 50%.

Name: Blammo!
Description: The guns are dual-wielded.

Name: Blank Generation
Description: Companion changes appearance to be older, automatically fires a second blank after Elder Blank's blank duration ends.

Name: Blast Crown
Description: Crown of Guns has a chance to fire explosives.

Name: Blessing and a Curse
Description: Every jammed enemy killed grants a persistent, additive 0.0025 (0.25%) damage buff.

Name: Block Party
Description: Increases the size of Brick Breaker's shells by 50%, and increases their damage by 25%.

Name: Bluer Guon Stone
Description: Blue Guon Stone's size and rotation speed is increased. If Blue Guon Stone blocks a bullet, it deals 15 damage to all nearby enemies.

Name: Blunderbrace
Description: Blunderbuss gains 50% increased shot speed and 25% larger bullets along with a shorter charge time.

Name: Bomberpal
Description: Lil' Bomber fires two bombs instead of one, charges twice as fast, and has 40% lower reload time.

Name: Brave New World
Description: While Siren is held, spawns a fish companion which shows what items are inside chests without opening them.

Name: Breakfast Club
Description: Halves the reload time of Wind Up Gun, increases fire rate by 60%, and increases damage by 50%. Increases magazine size to 27, and all but the last 10 shots of each magazine will be stronger piercing lasers.

Name: Buggin' Out
Description: While Gungeon Ant is held, Bug Boots spread oil instead of poison, and the player is immune to fire.

Name: Bullet Kiln
Description: Using Elder Blank while having The Kiln or Luxin Cannon selected gives one Glass Guon Stone to the player, up to a maximum of four. This limit can be worked around by dropping excess glass guon stones on the floor before using the Elder Blank, and then collecting them again.

Name: Bullet or the Egg
Description: Scrambler shots become larger and split into 10 seekers instead of 5.

Name: Bubble Trouble
Description: Siren now shoots a single, large bullet, and Bubble Blaster gains homing shots.

Name: Buckle Up
Description: Gungine has a chance to not consume ammo upon firing. Continuously moving with Gungine held gives the player a yellow glow, significantly increasing Gungine's rate of fire. The glow disappears if the player stops moving. If the player switches to another gun while outlined, they can keep the rate of fire bonus.

Name: Buster Gun
Description: Excaliber fires 3 or 4 projectiles in a cone when reloaded.

Name: Cactus Flower
Description: Cactus has a chance to shoot out a prickly pear that bounces off walls and shoots needles all around.

Name: Camera Shy
Description: Camera has a chance to stun enemies.

Name: Captain Plant It
Description: Portable Turret gains Unity's damage bonus.

Name: Careful Iteration
Description: Casey becomes spiked and fires a spread of 6 nails each time it is swung.

Name: Cash Rules Everygun Around Me
Description: When firing any gun, occasionally fires money which charms enemies.

Name: Cast Iron
Description: Gives Big Iron transmogrification effects and replaces each bullet with one from Bundle of Wands, Witch Pistol, and Hexagun.

Name: Cat Friend
Description: Bait Launcher's tigers attach several Cat Claw needles onto enemies when they maul them.

Name: Cerebral Bros
Description: Bullet Bore fires 2 drills per shot instead of the usual 1.

Name: Chain Lightning
Description: Increases the range that Shock Rounds connects bullets with electricity. Lightning can also connect to enemy bullets.

Name: Chance On Hit
Description: Gunderfury shots have a chance to slow enemies.

Name: Chest High is the Best High
Description: Increases damage by 25% and activates the Macho Brace effect after flipping a table. This version of the Macho Brace effect is different to the actual item's, as it increases damage by 100% for a brief time rather than Macho Brace's 30%.

Name: Chicken Arise
Description: Increases the chance for the guns to transmogrify enemies.

Name: Chief Master
Description: Alien Sidearm has a much larger magazine and cannot be charged, but becomes fully automatic and the final two shots in the magazine are fully-charged shots.

Name: Circle of Bricks
Description: The guns are dual-wielded.

Name: Clawntlet
Description: The player releases a spiral of bullets whenever they take damage.

Name: Clearer Guon Stone
Description: Grants immunity to poison, fire, and electricity. Shooting enemies while standing on fire or ice will burn or freeze them, respectively.

Name: Cold 1896
Description: The guns are dual-wielded. Both guns' magazine sizes are doubled.

Name: Cold Ones
Description: Significantly increases the chance of firing ice bullets.

Name: Comammo Belt
Description: Com4nd0 gains double magazine size and changes appearance.

Name: Contractual Obligation
Description: A pool of oil spawns underneath enemies killed with Gungine.

Name: Contrail
Description: Alien Engine's sprite changes and the flame turns green, igniting enemies with green fire. Alien Engine also grants flight while held.

Name: Cool Kids Club
Description: Continuously moving with Strafe Gun held gives the player a yellow glow, increasing movement speed. The glow disappears if the player stops moving.

Name: Cormorant
Description: Transforms the player into Cormorant. Removes reload times from all guns entirely. Increases curse by 3.

Name: Cosmic Horror
Description: Black holes fire three tentacles while active.

Name: Crave the Glaive
Description: Kruller Glaive will try to hit every enemy in the room before returning, similar to the Boomerang.

Name: Crestfallen Soul
Description: Increases dodge roll speed by 20%. Crestfaller deals 50% more damage if the player dies and has not yet retrieved their soul.

Name: Criticaliber
Description: After taking damage with Vorpal Gun held, the next Vorpal Gun shot is guaranteed to be a critical shot.

Name: Cryptic Cryptids
Description: Phoenix shoots out rows of fire on the ground. Both guns pierce enemies and deal additional damage. The player is immune to fire while the guns are held.

Name: Crystal Horn
Description: Luxin Cannon gets three crystal shots at the end of each magazine, and each crystal shot bursts into many more crystals. Additionally, when an enemy is killed with Unicorn Horn, they explode into Luxin Cannon projectiles.

Name: Dawn of the Gundead
Description: Doubles the chance for Zombie Bullets to refund missed shots for the guns.

Name: Dead Cell
Description: Decreases Railgun's charge time and increases its damage to bosses by 30%.

Name: Dead Place
Description: Increases Mine Cutter's damage by 25%.

Name: Dead Prez
Description: Derringer fires bouncing Dueling Pistol shots. Dueling Pistol fires a wide spread of 4 bullets alongside its normal shots.

Name: Deadly Distraction
Description: Decoy creates a large poison pool when attacked.

Name: Deadlier Distraction
Description: Decoy explodes and creates a large poison pool when attacked.

Name: Death Square
Description: Damaging enemies with Dueling Pistol rapidly recharges Dueling Laser.

Name: Decorated
Description: Hegemony Carbine fires triple shots.

Name: Decoy Octorok
Description: The decoy will turn into a charmed enemy.

Name: Detective Magnum
Description: The guns are dual-wielded.

Name: Detective Mode
Description: Increases 38 Special's maximum ammo to 600, halves reload time, and increases damage by 20%. The police officer will also reveal the contents of nearby chests.

Name: Devil's Plaything
Description: Bullet Idol orbits the player, blocking enemy shots.

Name: Diamond Weapon
Description: The last shot of each magazine is guaranteed to be an ice bullet.

Name: Diazepam
Description: Increases the damage of the guns by 50%.

Name: Don't Hoot the Messenger
Description: Dungeon Eagle's charged shots gain significant knockback.

Name: Don't Worry About The Vase
Description: Destroying small breakable objects (vases, barrels, etc.) has a small chance to activate a blank effect.

Name: Double Down
Description: Removes the cooldown from Gunboots; every roll will fire bullets.

Name: Double Double Helix
Description: Helix Gun Fires 4 projectiles per shot instead of 2, damage is increased by 25%, and shot speed is increased by 50%.

Name: Double Rainbow
Description: While Stuffed Star is active, five Unicorn Horn beams are fired from the player in all directions.

Name: Dr Worm
Description: Heck Blaster ammo replenishes slowly.

Name: Dragunice
Description: Dragunfire shoots a blue fireball that has a chance to burn and/or freeze enemies.

Name: Dualing Pistol
Description: Dueling Pistol changes appearance and its shots seek enemies.

Name: Dumb Smart Bullets
Description: Bullets unaffected by Homing Bullets become larger and deal 50% more damage.

Name: Dwarven Stout
Description: Double Vision triples shots instead of doubling them.

Name: The Ecstasy Of Gold
Description: Increases the damage of both guns by 25%.

Name: EGG MURDERER
Description: Light Gun's ducks periodically send out two Scrambler shots perpendicular to itself as it travels.

Name: Elder Blank Bullets
Description: Blank Bullets's blank effect reflects bullets instead of deleting them.

Name: Electron Pack
Description: Kills with Proton Backpack spawn allied ghosts that attack enemies.

Name: Emerald Weapon
Description: The last shot of each magazine is guaranteed to be a poison bullet.

Name: Emergency Help
Description: Reduces the reload time of Flare Gun by 66% and increases its damage by 50%. While Flare Gun is held, random enemies will periodically have explosions erupt around them, damaging them and hurting other enemies around them.

Name: Empty Vessels
Description: If damage is taken while Bottle is empty, it fills with a purple flame that deals 100 damage to all enemies in the room upon use.

Name: Enter the Fruitgeon
Description: Orange Guon Stone fires oranges at enemies, dealing 7 damage.

Name: Extreme Operation
Description: Using Melted Rock causes corpses to shoot at enemies.

Name: Fairy Bow
Description: Halves the charge time of Bow and adds a chance of firing an extra arrow, similar to the effect of Shadow Bullets.

Name: Finger on the Pulse
Description: Upon taking damage, spawns 3 Pulse Cannons that attack enemies.

Name: Fear the Old Blood
Description: Decreases the reload time of Trick Gun by 33% and increases fire rate by 20%.

Name: Fightknives
Description: Activating Knife Shield while holding Fightsabre makes the spawned knives reflect bullets before getting destroyed. Knives spawned this way are tinted green.

Name: Fightsabre Training
Description: While Fightsabre is held, an orbital appears that blocks enemy shots.

Name: Firing With Flair
Description: Flare Gun sets green fire, which leaves enemies permanently burning.

Name: Five O'Clock Somewhere
Description: Reloading will fire a glass bottle that will stun enemies it hits. Reloading while standing on a liquid replenishes the ammo missing in the current magazine, similar to Gungine.

Name: Flat Stanley
Description: Reduces the magazine size of Mailbox by 50% and reduces its reload time by 33%.

Name: Friend to Gun and Bullet
Description: While Potion of Gun Friendship is active, a copy of the player's current gun appears and automatically fires at nearby enemies.

Name: Frosty Distraction
Description: Decoy freezes enemies that attack it.

Name: Frostier Distraction
Description: Decoy freezes enemies that attack it and explodes after a short period.

Name: Frosty the Bullet Tyrant
Description: Snowballer shots increase in size and damage the further they travel.

Name: Full Circle
Description: Tangler becomes round, turns enemies round instead of rectangular, and gains increased damage and reload time.

Name: Future Gangster
Description: Thompson Sub-Machinegun fires lasers. Each laser does 6.5 damage instead of the normal 5 damage.

Name: Garbage Collecting
Description: Hitting an enemy with Trashcannon causes it and its bullets to briefly freeze.

Name: Get Equipped With -A-
Description: Enables Air Shooter mode which fires Balloon Gun tornadoes when uncharged. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Name: Get Equipped With -B-
Description: Enables Bubble Lead mode which fires Bubble Blaster bubbles when uncharged. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Name: Get Equipped With -C-
Description: Enables Crash Bomber mode, which fires a Bullet Bore bullet at full charge. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Name: Get Equipped with -F-
Description: Enables Time Stopper mode, which fires a flash that stops time for a second and deals damage to all enemies on screen when fully charged. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Name: Get Equipped With -H-
Description: Enables Atomic Fire mode which fires piercing fireballs when uncharged that set everything in their path on fire. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Name: Get Equipped With -M-
Description: Enables Metal Blade mode which fires Buzzkill shots when uncharged. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Name: Get Equipped With -Q-
Description: Enables Quick Boomerang mode which fires small boomerang shots that stun enemies when uncharged. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Name: Get Equipped With -W-
Description: Enables Leaf Shield mode, where uncharged shots fire leaves while charged shots fire regular charged Megahand shots. Killing enemies in this mode spawns leaves that orbit the player, blocking enemy shots. Modes can be switched by reloading Megahand with a full magazine.

Name: Ghost With The Most
Description: Ghosts from Gunslinger's Ashes are larger and can freeze enemies. Reload time decreased by 20%.

Name: Gilded Tables
Description: Tables have a 15% chance to be golden. Flipping a golden table will cause all normal enemies in the room to drop 2 to 6 extra  upon death. Golden tables will not automatically flip due to Table Tech Money.

Name: Great Queen Ant
Description: Gungeon Ant becomes an ant queen and shoots rocket ants.

Name: Green Thumb
Description: This synergy does nothing.

Name: Greener Guon Stone
Description: Chance for the Green Guon Stone to heal upon taking damage is raised to 70% if that damage would have killed the player. 20  also appears whenever Green Guon Stone heals the player.

Name: Grouch
Description: Increases Trashcannon damage by 25%.

Name: Gruber's Bane
Description: Backup Gun has a 100% chance of firing shadow bullets.

Name: Gunderlord
Description: Patriot shots are connected with electricity. Ice Breaker fires single high-velocity shots instead of shotgun spreads, and Ice Breaker ammo slowly regenerates over time.

Name: Gungeonite
Description: Gamma Ray leaves poison on the ground.

Name: Gunnerang
Description: Increases the damage of thrown guns by 50%.

Name: Guns and Deviltry
Description: Increases the guns' damage by 25%, and they fire a knife whenever reloading.

Name: Hacker
Description: Increases the damage of Lower Case r by 25%.

Name: Hail, Satan!
Description: Demon Head gains piercing.

Name: Hail To The King
Description: Increases Yari Launcher's magazine size by 50% and damage by 20%.

Name: Hammer and Anvil
Description: Firing Cobalt Hammer's charge attack also sends out anvils in all directions.

Name: Hammer and Nail
Description: Increases max ammo of both guns by 50%. Nail Gun deals triple damage. H4mmer gets 5 hammer shots at the end of every magazine.

Name: Hard Light
Description: Hyper Light Blaster gains homing and its maximum ammo is increased by 50%. Light Gun has a chance to regenerate ammo when hitting enemies.

Name: Hardwood
Description: Mahoguny fires four explosive shots at a time.

Name: Heads Up
Description: Stone Dome fires homing skulls.

Name: Heart-Shaped Box
Description: Lament Configurum heals the player instead of dealing damage.

Name: Heavy Artillery
Description: The guns are dual-wielded.

Name: Heavy Jolt
Description: Jolter changes appearance, gains increased knockback and increased accuracy.

Name: Heavy Metal
Description: Decreases Anvillain's shot speed by 25% and increases damage by 20%.

Name: Hegemony Special Forces
Description: Hegemony Rifle bullets are replaced by piercing lasers.

Name: Hellhole
Description: Singularity spawns a hell portal that sucks enemies in and deals high damage.

Name: Hell Singing
Description:
Increases the damage of the guns against jammed enemies by 50%.
This bonus stacks with the damage from Silver Bullets, for a total of 487.5% damage to jammed enemies.

Name: Hidden Tech Bees
Description: A swarm of bees replaces enemy bullets when a table is flipped.

Name: Hidden Tech Big Shotgun
Description: Table Tech Shotgun shoots Big Shotgun rounds when Big Shotgun is held.

Name: Hidden Tech Flare
Description: Flipping tables ignite enemies in higher damage green fire. Range is also greatly increased

Name: Hidden Tech Time
Description: Flipping a table briefly stops time.

Name: Holy Bell
Description: Killing an enemy with Trident creates a large circular area that slows time.

Name: Hornucopia
Description: Banana splits into 5 new bananas instead of 3 upon impact, one of which will explode into 4 more bananas. Using Charm Horn fires a banana at each enemy it charms.

Name: Hot Head
Description: Stone Dome shots burn enemies.

Name: Hot Ones
Description: Significantly increases the chance of firing fire bullets.

Name: Hot Rolls
Description: Rolling creates a trail of fire.

Name: Hotter Than Heck
Description: Increases the size and damage of the guns by 25% and grants immunity to fire.

Name: http://merch.devolverdigital.com
Description: Doubles Microtransaction Gun's damage.

Name: Human Shield
Description: Upon use, Melted Rock spawns a Betrayer's Shield shield on every corpse.

Name: Hunter-Seeker Tables
Description: Table rockets home in on enemies while Com4nd0 is held.

Name: Hydro Pump
Description: Increases the size, knockback, speed, and damage of Mega Douser's stream.

Name: Hyper Beam
Description: When Pig dies, Heroine's ammo is fully refilled and it temporarily switches to Hyper Beam mode, where uncharged shots deal 80 damage and charged shots deal 160 damage. Heroine will automatically revert to its original form after 30 seconds.

Name: I need scissors! 61!
Description: Trank Gun's fire rate is decreased, damage and reload time are increased, and its bullets will inflict slow and stun.

Name: I Studied The Blade
Description: The guns are dual-wielded.

Name: Ice Accumulation
Description: Significantly increases the size of the gun's shots, and increases the amount of damage they gain from Snowballets.

Name: Ice Beam
Description: Enables Ice Beam mode, which fires a projectile that instantly freezes an enemy when fully charged. Modes can be switched by reloading Heroine with a full magazine.

Name: Ice Cap
Description: Freeze Ray freezes enemies much quicker.

Name: Ice To Meet You
Description: Firing with any gun will periodically fire a Heart of Ice projectile that splits and bounces.

Name: Ice Water
Description: Mega Douser freezes enemies and leaves a trail of ice. Both weapons deal 30% more damage, and the size of the Mega Douser's stream is increased.

Name: In The Mood!
Description: Slightly increases movement speed and increases the shot speed of the guns by 25%.

Name: Inconsistent Scale
Description: While Gungeon Ant is held, creates a beehive orbital that spawns bees.

Name: Insight
Description: A creature appears at entrances to secret rooms, revealing their location.

Name: Iron Slug
Description: Big Iron fires a single high-damage slug.

Name: Iron Stance
Description: Increases damage and knockback by 20%, increases shot speed by 50%, and decreases reload time by 20%.

Name: Iroquois
Description: Decreases the reload time of MAC10 by 33%, increases its magazine size by 50%, and increases its knockback by 50%.

Name: It's Your Destiny
Description: Ice Breaker fires single high-velocity shots instead of shotgun spreads, and slowly regenerates ammo over time. The Exotic's rockets split into 14 smaller rockets instead of 7.

Name: J am
Description: Reduces reload times by 33%.

Name: Jolly Roger
Description: Skull Spitter fires three skulls per shot, and skulls are linked like VertebraeK-47 shots. VertebraeK-47 can freeze enemies.

Name: Jotun Time
Description: Reloading chills and freezes nearby enemies. Thrown guns deal 180% more damage.

Name: Jumping... is useless
Description: Quad Laser shots fire four continuous lasers in a cross formation as they travel. Doubles Quad Laser's shot speed and triples its reload time.

Name: Junk Mail
Description: Mailbox only shoots packages while Magazine Rack is active.

Name: Just In Case
Description: Lower Case r becomes a capital letter R and transforms into a one shot rocket launcher. It fires the word ROCKET with cloud sprites when shot, and creates a cartoony BOOM cloud when it hits something.

Name: Just Like The Real Thing
Description: Shotgrub fires a wide spread of five bullets, which bounce back and split into waving bullets after hitting a wall, similar to the Shotgrub enemy's attack.

Name: Just Shoot Me
Description: Magazine Rack shoots at nearby enemies while it is active and Camera is held.

Name: Kage Bunshin
Description: Using Decoy spawns a shadow clone of the player that mirrors their movements and fires towards the crosshair whenever the player fires.

Name: Kaliber k'pow uboom k'bhang
Description: The split soul initially moves towards the player instead of away.

Name: Kaliber's Grip
Description: Abyssal Tentacle grabs two enemies at a time.

Name: Kalibreath
Description: Dragunfire turns grey and has an increased rate of fire.

Name: Keep The Change
Description: Blank Companion's Ring will sometimes activate when M16 empties its magazine.

Name: Keeping The Beat
Description: Metronome grants +4% damage per kill instead of +2%, and maxes out at +250% damage instead of +150%. Metronome's icon color goes from red to purple to grey instead of ending at red.

Name: Key Witness
Description: Occasionally fires an AKEY-47 shot whenever the player fires a gun.

Name: The Killing Joke
Description: The guns are dual-wielded.

Name: King Bomber
Description: Lil' Bomber's bombs become gold and spawn  every time they hit an enemy.

Name: Kinjutsu
Description: Shadow Clone spawns three clones.

Name: Klobbering Time
Description: Klobbe is doubled.

Name: Knight Time
Description: Taking damage will briefly stop time.

Name: Kung Fu Hippie, Rappin' Surfer
Description: Increases Rad Gun's magazine size to 20, and decreases its reload speed, giving more time to hit the mark. Also grants 1.33 coolness, makes the skateboard pink, and turns the hat backwards.

Name: Land Among The Stars
Description: Killing enemies with Moonscraper has a chance to send out three planets, which damage enemies and start orbiting the player if they fail to hit an enemy.

Name: Laser Light Show
Description: Laser Rifle becomes blue and gold, and fires 3 sets of 3 shots in a spread per trigger pull. Each shot bounces once.

Name: Liches Get Stitches
Description: Grants a large attack speed increase for a short duration after an enemy is killed.

Name: Like Shooting Fish
Description: A fish pops out of the barrel and fires bullets. The last shot of each magazine fires a fish that flops around on the ground and fires at enemies.

Name: The Line Of Fire
Description: Composite Gun shots leave a trail of fire.

Name: Lotus Bloom
Description: Laser Lotus gains the appearance of a flower. Its magazine size increases to 32, its maximum ammo increases to 250, its fire rate greatly increases, and it deals half damage.

Name: Love/Hate
Description: The guns are dual-wielded.

Name: Lumberjacked
Description: Increases the damage of the guns by 25%.

Name: M1 Multi-Tool
Description: Decreases M1's reload time by 20% and increases its magazine size, and maximum ammo. Increases movement speed. Changes appearance to resemble an M14.

Name: Mad Cats
Description: The bullets shot from Cat Bullet King Throne home in on enemies.

Name: Magazine Clips
Description: Magazine Rack's radius doubles.

Name: Mak Pak
Description: Increases Makarov's maximum ammo by 30%. While holding Marakov, it occasionally fires a homing bullet at an enemy for free.

Name: Mass Cutter
Description: Whenever a Mass Shotgun shot splits, a cone of Mine Cutter lasers is fired.

Name: Massive Effect
Description: Significantly increases the size of Mass Shotgun's shots.

Name: Master's Chambers
Description: Each Master Round the player carries permanently unlocks the mode of its respective floor for Chamber Gun. Reloading the gun with a full magazine cycles through the unlocked modes.

Name: Maximize Spell
Description: Flame Hand becomes green and creates pools of green fire. Green fire does not damage the player, and enemies that touch green fire are permanently aflame.

Name: Max Pane
Description: If hit, Glass Guon Stone breaks, but Glass Cannon retains its ammo.

Name: Meltdown
Description: Gamma Ray branches twice to form a spread of 5 beams. Using Big Boy refills 100 Gamma Ray ammo.

Name: Mine Craft
Description: Mines created by Cluster Mine home in on enemies.

Name: Mirror Shield
Description: Shield of the Maiden reflects enemy bullets while active.

Name: MM6 Mini Rocket
Description: Activating Jetpack fires a rocket in the direction of the crosshair. This has an approximate 5 second cooldown.

Name: Mmmmmmmmm MMMMmm!
Description: Increases the damage, maximum ammo, and rate of fire of the guns by 25%.

Name: Monsters and Monocles
Description: Increases the ignition range of Teapot's reload effect.

Name: Moonplanet
Description: A moon orbits the player that blocks enemy shots.

Name: Mr. Shadow
Description: Zorgun Shadow Bullets become the random explosives Zorgun fires as its last shot.

Name: Monster Grub
Description: Shotgrub reloads faster and its bullets gain homing.

Name: Nailed It!
Description: Nails deal triple damage.

Name: Napalm B
Description: Mega Douser's water spreads fire instead of extinguishing it.

Name: Natural Selection
Description: Evolver evolves after every 3 unique enemy types killed instead of 5.

Name: Needless Acrimony
Description: Rage duration is greatly increased if a table is flipped while Shotgun Full of Hate is held.

Name: Neo Tech, Yo
Description: Mutation's beam turns blue and creates electrified water. The player is immune to electricity while Mutation is held.

Name: No Odd Job
Description: The guns are dual-wielded. Increases damage by 20% and spread by 60%, decreasing accuracy.

Name: Not Quite As Mini
Description: Increases Vulcan Cannon's maximum ammo by 25% and significantly increases fire rate.

Name: Not So Sawed-Off
Description: Buzzkill's saw blades are linked by lightning.

Name: Noxin Cannon
Description: Luxin Cannon and its shots turn grey, and the lasers deal 25% more damage.

Name: One Fish Two Fish
Description: With each shot, Barrel fires a normal blue fish and a red fish that sets enemies on fire.

Name: Oranger Guon Stone
Description: Orange Guon Stone grows in size, fires more frequently, and deals more damage.

Name: Orrery
Description: Planets fired by Mr. Accretion Jr. have smaller bullets orbiting them like moons; these bullets persist when the missed shots start orbiting the player.

Name: Outer Limits
Description: Firing three planets into Singularity's black hole causes it to explode and deal 100 damage to all enemies in the room.

Name: Over Dose
Description: Heavy Bullets no longer decreases shot speed.

Name: Paperwork
Description: The first shot after reloading Origuni fires three planes.

Name: Paper Lanterns
Description: While holding either gun in a room with enemies, paper lanterns periodically spawn, which drift towards enemies and deal damage.

Name: Pandemic Pistol
Description: Plague Pistol bullets bounce and are connected with electricity.

Name: Parchmental
Description: Each Origuni shot fires two maps.

Name: Particle Accelerator
Description: Whenever a smaller bullet hits an enemy, a laser is automatically fired in its direction.

Name: Particle Flow
Description: The guns home in on enemies.

Name: Pea Cannon
Description: Pea Shooter shots become larger, deal more damage, and explode.

Name: Peripheral Vision
Description: Upon hitting an enemy 3 times with Light Gun, a dog appears and attacks that enemy.

Name: Phoenix Up
Description: Changes the look of Phoenix and summons a Phoenix companion that fires at enemies.

Name: Pilot Wingsman
Description: Wingman fires four rockets at a time.

Name: Pinker Guon Stone
Description: Enemies that damage the player become temporarily charmed.

Name: Pistol Machine
Description: Machine Pistol shots gain the effect of Angry Bullets and are connected with electricity.

Name: Pitch Perfect
Description: Pitchfork fires green fireballs, setting enemies permanently aflame.

Name: Plant Power
Description: Triple Gun reaches its laser beam phase earlier.

Name: Plasma Beam
Description: Enables Plasma Beam mode, which fires a fire laser when uncharged and a large piercing fire projectile when charged. Modes can be switched by reloading Heroine with a full magazine.

Name: Porkulent
Description: Allows the player to make purchases without losing the Ring.

Name: Poseigun
Description: Trident fires a spread of three beams per shot, no longer benefits from rolling, has its magazine size increased to 8, and has its fire rate reduced greatly. Crown of Guns randomly fires Trident beams.

Name: Powerhouse of the Cell
Description: Evolver evolves one stage.

Name: Praise the Gun
Description: Dodge roll recovery time is reduced. A bonfire spawns in every Shop and elevator to the next floor. If the player dies, they will respawn at the last bonfire they activated instead of at the start of the floor.

Name: Pretty Good
Description: Increases coolness by 2.

Name: Primitive Shapes
Description: Tangler's shots become much larger and deal 50% more damage, but travel very slowly. Quad Laser's shots become rectangles and travel faster.

Name: Production Model
Description: Prototype Railgun shots bounce up to 5 times.

Name: Pulp Gungeon
Description: A copy of M1911 orbits the player and fires whenever the player fires.

Name: Queen of Hearts
Description: When at full health, picking up hearts will turn them to coins.

Name: Quick and the Gundead
Description: Shots fired by Hip Holster home in on enemies.

Name: RAIDEN
Description: Increases Raiden Coil's max ammo capacity by 25%. Pairs of bullets are fired alongside the laser. Massively reduces ammo consumption.

Name: Raizo's Stuff
Description: Bullets shot while being pulled with Grappling Hook gain homing.

Name: Recycling Bin
Description: Trashcannon becomes a recycling bin with higher damage and a larger magazine size, and no longer creates poison projectiles.

Name: The Red Hood
Description: While Huntsman is held, Wolf's attacks will significantly weaken enemies.

Name: Redder Guon Stone
Description: Red Guon Stone's size is increased. Player will gain a yellow glow and stat increase similar to that of Macho Brace for a short time whenever Red Guon Stone blocks a bullet.

Name: Regular Old Guns
Description: Quadruples the guns' rate of fire but decreases their damage by 25%.

Name: Reload Roll
Description:
Rolling reloads six bullets.

Dodge roll distance is increased by 20% when the gun held.

Name: Relodestar
Description: After Relodestone's effect ends, the bullets that were absorbed are shot out of the player dealing damage to enemies.

Name: Resourceful Indeed,
Description: Player becomes the Resourceful Rat. This prevents items from being stolen when they're left behind in rooms.

Name: Revolution
Description: Increases the damage of Dueling Pistol by 25%, and allows its bullets to bounce five times instead of twice.

Name: Rubenstein's Monster
Description: The two guns are combined to form Rubenstein's Monster.

Name: Ruby Carbine
Description: Hegemony Carbine shots light enemies on fire and bounce.

Name: Ruby Weapon
Description: The last shot of each magazine is guaranteed to be a fire bullet.

Name: Running Blades
Description: Killing an enemy with Deck4rd has a high chance to spawn a Knife Shield knife.

Name: Rabid
Description: Lower Case r spells out LOSER, DORK, CHUMP, NOODLE, and TAFFER.

Name: Radiant
Description: Lower Case r spells out SILVER, BLESSED, and WEREWOLF.

Name: Ravishing
Description: Lower Case r spells out HANDSOME, CHARM, and CUTE.

Name: Reactive
Description: Lower Case r spells ROCKET, BOOM, KABOOM, and POW when fired and rounds explode.

Name: Reanimate
Description: Lower Case r spells out SPOOKY, GHOST, and BOO.

Name: Reinforced
Description: Lower Case r spells out BULLET+1.

Name: Remnant
Description: When firing Lower Case r, adds an omega letter after each BULLET.

Name: Replete
Description: Lower Case r spells out COWABUNGA, BOOYAKASHA, THANK YOU, THANKS, HASTA LA VISTA, TOODLES, GOODBYE, FAREWELL and GAME OVER.

Name: Research
Description:
Lower Case r spells out CHEST and MIMIC.

Can be used to open locked chests.

Name: Resplendent
Description: Lower Case r spells out CASH, COINS, SHELLS, and GOLD.

Name: Root
Description: When firing Lower Case r, adds an alpha letter before each BULLET.

Name: Runic
Description: Lower Case r spells out ABRA and KADABRA.

Name: Sausage and Peppers
Description: Significantly increases the radius of Gungeon Pepper's damaging aura, and Meatbun heals five hearts.

Name: Saved the Best for Last
Description: Shots fired by Hip Holster explode.

Name: Savior of the Universe
Description: Flash Ray's shots gain unlimited piercing, a thicker beam, one bounce, and increased fire rate. When reloaded from an empty clip, Flash Ray produces a flash that hits all enemies in the room, like Camera. Camera fires 2 laser beams when fired.

Name: Second Accident
Description: Shotbow fires 9 parallel arrows straight forward.

Name: Secret Twin
Description: Holding Vulcan Cannon and using Ticket spawns two friendly Gatling Gulls instead of one.

Name: Serious Sam Publishing Contract
Description: Alongside the standard cannonball, Serious Cannon fires a screaming man who chases enemies and explodes on contact. Serious Cannon also gains a chance to "Devolve" enemies.

Name: Shadow Warrior
Description: A Demon Head orbits the player while they have one of the guns held. When they reload one of them, the orbiting Demon Head fires at nearby enemies. Reduces the guns' spread by 60%, increasing their accuracy.

Name: Shell-A-Ton
Description: Baby Good Shelleton moves and shoots much faster.

Name: Shield Night
Description: Reloading Knight's Gun places a shield, similar to Betrayer's Shield.

Name: Shot Across The Bow
Description: Gunbow fires explosive missiles.

Name: Shotgun Affinity
Description: All weapons in the SHOTGUN gun class gain piercing, increased knockback, and increased shot speed. Shotgun style weapons that aren't in the SHOTGUN class, such as the Shotgun Full of Love or Tangler are not affected.

Name: Shredder
Description: Doubles the spread of the guns, decreasing their accuracy.

Name: Siren Sidearm
Description: The first shot of every Siren magazine fires two fish. Every Barrel shot fires a Siren water bubble.

Name: Slings and Arrows
Description: Bow can be charged longer to fire a special arrow that deals 50 damage.

Name: Sleuth Out
Description: While held, decreases enemy projectile speed by 20%, but decreases 38 Special's rate of fire by 20%.

Name: Smart Bombs
Description: Bombs home in on enemies.

Name: Smile, you son of a...
Description: Compressed Air Tank's sharks will explode upon biting an enemy. These explosions can damage the player.

Name: Snicker-snack
Description: Excaliber fires a spread of 3 homing shots that deal 20% less damage.

Name: Sniper Woof
Description: Reduces reload times of the guns by 30%. Standing still for a short time (around 1–2 seconds) causes the player to glow yellow, increasing the damage of the guns by 50%. This effect persists until the player switches weapons or moves. Sniper Shells and Professionals are permanently charmed.

Name: Snowball Shotgun
Description: Snowballer fires multiple snowballs at once in a shotgun spread with lowered rate of fire.

Name: Soft Air
Description: When holding JK-47, the player regains ammo when walking over liquids. Increases range that reloading causes fear.

Name: Softshell
Description: While Stuffed Star is active, Brick Breaker shells are continually fired in random directions.

Name: Solar Flare
Description: Flare Gun pierces enemies and explodes when hitting a wall.

Name: some even larger number
Description: Killing an enemy with Triple Gun shoots a Quad Laser bullet from where the enemy died.

Name: Space Best Friend
Description: Space Friend fires at a much faster rate.

Name: Spartan Loadout
Description: Cat Claw pierces enemies, attaching its explosive to every enemy hit. Alien Sidearm can be charged twice to fire a more powerful shot.

Name: Special Delivery
Description: Makes the guns' shots bounce. Owl becomes skeletal in appearance and fires bouncing, letter-shaped bullets.

Name: Special Reserve
Description: Molotovs create green fire pools. Green fire does not damage the player, and enemies that touch green fire are permanently aflame.

Name: Spelunker
Description: Replaces the bullet spread of Gunboots with a short-ranged explosion.

Name: Spicy D-Boys
Description: Increases coolness by 2. Lights nearby enemies on fire while reloading Strafe Gun.

Name: Spengbab
Description: Increases the knockback and range of Tangler by 50%.

Name: Square Brace
Description: Increases Polaris ammo capacity to 700, increases its magazine size to 30, increases damage by 20%, increases fire rate when leveled up, and changes its appearance.

Name: Star Friends
Description: While Stuffed Star is active, the player continually fires maximum level Polaris shots in all directions.

Name: Starburst Fire
Description: Firing once with either weapon rapidly fires its entire magazine. Increases damage by 20% and doubles fire rate.

Name: Steel Skin
Description: AC-15 will remain in its powered-up form even if the player has no armor.

Name: The Submachinist
Description: The guns are dual-wielded.

Name: Succulent DOOM
Description: Every Cactus shot fires a spread of 5 needles.

Name: Super Bomberpal
Description: Lil' Bomber fires two bombs instead of one, charges twice as fast, and has 20% lower reload time.

Name: Super Serum
Description: Increases the magazine size of the guns by 50%, increases the size of their projectiles, and allows them to bounce once.

Name: Super Space Turtle DX
Description: Super Space Turtle becomes jammed, firing piercing shots with higher damage.

Name: Sweetness and Light
Description: Magic Lamp gains triple shot. Each shot deals 25% of the normal damage, but the genie deals full damage.

Name: Swift Sloop
Description: Increases Corsair's shot speed by 50%, decreases its charge time by 33%, and decreases its reload time by 20%.

Name: Synthetic Shield
Description: Creates a companion that orbits the player and blocks shots. If the player has two of the three synthesizers, the companion will take the appearance of the third synthesizer. If the player has all three synthesizers, all three companions will spawn.

Name: Tea for Two
Description: When reloading Teapot, a red aura appears around companions. Every enemy in this aura will be ignited.

Name: Tears of Blood
Description: Tear Jerker's tears turn red and inflict slow.

Name: Telefrag
Description: If Teleporter Prototype teleports the player to a room with enemies, all enemies in the room will be killed instantly. If it teleports the player to a special room, Teleporter Prototype's cooldown is decreased.

Name: Terminated, Too
Description: Grenade Launcher's grenades fire 8 bullets in all directions upon exploding.

Name: that &^#$# 'pizza'
Description: RPG now fires remote-controlled explosive fists, just like Machine Fist. Machine Fist's bullets also bounce twice.

Name: The Elephant in the Room
Description: Elephant Gun becomes an elephant head and shoots elephants instead of bullets.

Name: The Return
Description: Pig fires bats and gains a green appearance.

Name: There Is Only War
Description: Reloading Jolter causes Demon Head to fire a beam at nearby enemies.

Name: Thermal Imaging
Description: The Predator fires two lasers instead of one.

Name: Thorn Bath, ooh!
Description: While one of the guns is held, nails are periodically fired in all directions.

Name: Three Part Harmony
Description: Really Special Lute's spread is drastically decreased.

Name: Three Sheets
Description: Increases movement speed, doubles the damage of the guns, and increases their bullet speed by 20%.

Name: Throw All Daggers
Description: Knife Shield generates two layers of knives upon use.

Name: Thrown For A Bloop
Description: While Bullet Time is active, a Blooper orbits the player and continually fires at enemies.

Name: Tile Match
Description: When the player fires Tetrominator, each Guon Stone has a chance to shoot a Tetromino corresponding to the type of Guon Stone.

Name: To Serve Android
Description: Police Officer turns into a robot and becomes unkillable.

Name: Trigger Twins
Description: The guns are dual-wielded. All guns have double ammo capacity and 50% larger magazine size.

Name: Triple Jump
Description: Grants three consecutive dodge rolls.

Name: Triple Sticky
Description: Sticky Crossbow fires three bolts per shot and its magazine size increases from 5 to 6. Triple Crossbow's triple shot explodes upon hitting an enemy.

Name: Turret Link
Description: Portable Turret will sometimes fire shots from guns in the player's inventory.

Name: Turtle Solutions
Description: Each room clear spawns another Super Space Turtle, up to a maximum of 4.

Name: Tutorialized
Description: A shield orbits the player, blocking enemy bullets.

Name: Twin Snakes
Description: Rattler fires a spread of poison beams instead of bullets and Snakemaker fires homing shots.

Name: Two Eggs Over Easy
Description: The Scrambler's homing shots will cause poison.

Name: Two Heavy
Description: Doubles the chance for Coin Crown to spawn money upon completing a room.

Name: Two Kinds of People
Description: Improves the items and pickups dug up by Knight's Gun.

Name: Unbelievably Charming
Description: While holding either the Charmed Bow or Shotgun Full of Love, all shots fired by the player (even shots fired via items other than either gun) and any companions are guaranteed to charm enemies. In addition, the player is followed by a fairy that blocks bullets and displays the contents of chests.

Name: Unsinkable
Description: Corsair fires exploding Titanic ships.

Name: Usurper
Description: Crown of Guns fires more bullets, and Cat Bullet King Throne fires full-sized bullets instead of mini-bullets.

Name: Vegetables
Description: Shots from the guns deal triple damage, are doubled in size, pierce enemies, and bounce off of obstacles.

Name: Venom Veins
Description: Gives Mutation poison effect.

Name: The Void Corps
Description: When one of the guns is held, the other(s) orbit the player. Whenever the player reloads, the orbiting gun(s) fire towards the crosshair.

Name: Vulcan Raving
Description: Increases knockback by 50%.

Name: Wave Beam
Description: Enables Wave Beam mode, which fires two wavy projectiles connected by electricity when uncharged, and a standard large Heroine shot when charged. Modes can be switched by reloading Heroine with a full magazine.

Name: Weird Science
Description: Three Science Cannon beams branch off perpendicular to Disintegrator's main beam.

Name: Well Dressed
Description: Both guns fire explosive wardrobes at the end of their magazines.

Name: Whale of a Time
Description: Also has a chance to spawn a healing skull if a weapon other than GuNNER is equipped when the player takes damage.

Name: What A Thrill
Description: Patriot has a chance to transmogrify enemies into snakes.

Name: what engine do you use
Description: Gungine fires a spread of three bullets per shot, but fires at 1/5th of its original speed.

Name: Whiter Guon Stone
Description:
Increases the size of White Guon Stone.

If the player has Daruma, its cooldown is halved.

Name: Why's Bullet Crying?
Description: Attacking a frozen enemy with one of the guns causes a yeti to attack it, dealing high damage.

Name: Wicked Sister
Description: Magnum gains a bayonet that blocks bullets when reloading, similar to Huntsman.

Name: Willing To Sacrifice
Description: Freeze Ray gains piercing and slowly regenerates ammo over time.

Name: Worlds of Guncraft
Description: Gunderfury will occasionally fire Mr. Accretion Jr. shots.

Name: Wound Up
Description: The damage and piercing of Wind Up Gun never decreases. Increases damage and bullet size by 25%.

Name: Wrath Of The Blam
Description: Tear Jerker is replaced with a crying bullet head that can only fire in cardinal directions, but deals double damage.

Name: y cant u crawl
Description: While Heroine is equipped, increases the size of Roll Bomb's explosions.

Name: \o/
Description: When Sunlight Javelin kills an enemy, it will spawn a circular zone that ignites all enemies within it.

In addition to its standard bonuses, upon successfully activating an active reload, Cog of Battle multiplies Klobbe's damage and knockback by 10 and removes all spread for a random portion of the current magazine.

This is a hidden synergy. It doesn't have a name and the blue arrow won't appear.
